subject: - Reorganized tones into Feeling, Attitude, Energy categories
body:
- Allow selecting up to 2 tones per message
- Added 'Most Used' row for frequently used tones
- Improved send button icon and alignment
- Made tone selector more compact (40% less space)
- Updated database schema to support tone arrays
- Enhanced tone comparison to show partial matches"
title: - Reorganized tones into Feeling, Attitude, Energy categories
